Text:
anoXmous:

Wow! It´s a déjà vu. We already had this conversation my friend. I won´t apology twice, it´s ridiculous. I said everything I had to say and explained everything I had to explain. I may be a stupid jerk but I discussed this on the forum and I´m not doing anything forbidden, so I´m afraid you will have to deal with it. 

In any case I´m truly glad you put the link to your torrent so that way people will be able to choose and our beloved swarm won´t be so spoiled. You should do the same with the others. It´s a free world mate.

Have a nice day
